Posts.Content: tinatba wrote: can somebody please give me some advice.....i am stage 3a already done three rounds of adriamycin and cytoxan and have one more to go they are really tough and i get them every two weeks i was given steroids the first two and i asked to not be given steroids this last time because they made me feel really swollen and i ate like crazy i also have to start paclitaxel immediately after finishing the other stuff once a week for 12 weeks..... IS PACLITAXEL AS BAD AS THE ADRIAMYCIN AND CYTOXAN????? WHAT ARE THE PROS AND CONS OF THE STEROIDS????? i got my first tumor marker number it is 71 they say it is high and normal due to it did spread to my lymph nodes so HOW FAR DOWN DO THEY USUALLY DROP WITH EACH TREATMENT?????? I AM NOTICING EXTRA FATIGUE THIS GO ROUND IS IT CAUSE I STOPPED THE STEROIDS OR JUST BECAUSE IT IS TAKING A TOLL ON MY BODY????? thanks for answers you ladies here are a great bunch of people and i thought who better to ask then people that has been here really tired 31year old mother of two tina Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: questions and concerns tinatba Teacher1959
I need emotional support kimvidito rspayne
